Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 从 类派生，并由 ASP.NET 用来包含 模板。

span.span: Derived from the class and used by ASP.NET to contain templates.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果移动控件提供了通过设备模板的模板化呈现功能，它必须创建的每个模板在单独控件中的类型实例。If a mobile control provides templated rendering features through device templates, it must create instances of each template inside a separate control of type . 在模板中，控件中的数据绑定表达式是否`Container`的表达式的变量的类型始终是。If a data-binding expression is in a control in a template, the `Container` variable of the expression is always of type . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用对象内创建模板移动窗体中的对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use objects to create templates within a object in a mobile form. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileTemplateContainerSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileTemplateContainerSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileTemplateContainerSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileTemplateContainerSample/vb/Default.aspx#1)] 所有上面的代码可以使用以下标记以声明方式替换：All of the code above can be replaced declaratively with the following markup: Web.config 文件必须具有以下行：The Web.config file must have the following lines:

summary.span: 获取或设置一个属性，该属性确定是否在控件后呈现附加尾随换行符。

span.span: Gets or sets a property that determines whether an additional trailing break is rendered after the control.

summary.span: 此换行符使后续内容从下一行开始。

span.span: This break causes subsequent content to start on the next line.
